page.title: 03AIRPORT/INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The wartime{Baginton airfield}is now the busy{Coventry Civic Airport.}It's main NE/SW runway enters GRID 3675 near Toll Bar End. Although most of the airport lies outside the area it does have an influence on people who live within the area. Aircraft{noise}is a nuisance in Toll Bar End. The former{Armstrong Siddeley Shadow {Factory}on the edge of the airfield is now a modern industrial estate. This estate is now known as{Siskin {Drive Industrial Estate}and is made up of some 25 small manufacturing firms, many of which deal in motor vehicle repair. For further information on Baginton and Coventry Civic Airport refer to the D-Square that adjoins the western edge of this square.
